revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Lostlorn Forest |image = [[File:Lostlorn Forest.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Lostlorn Forest. |tokens = 176,500 |location = Unova Route 16 }} '''Lostlorn Forest''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Unova]]. It initially has 81 tiles arranged in an 9x9 square, including 9 chest tiles, 21 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 3,203,000 HP.
==Encounter Tables==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Roselia.png|40px]] Roselia || [[File:Pokémon_Breeder_(male).png|40px]] Pokémon Breeder Galen || [[File:Tranquill.png|40px]] Tranquill,[[File:Liepard.png|40px]] Liepard |- | [[File:Combee.png|40px]] Combee || [[File:Pokémon_Ranger_(female).png|40px]] Pokémon Ranger Serenity || [[File:Trubbish.png|40px]] Trubbish |- | [[File:Sewaddle.png|40px]] Sewaddle || rowspan=2|[[File:Pokémon_Ranger_(male).png|40px]] Pokémon Ranger Forrest || rowspan=2|[[File:Emolga.png|40px]] Emolga |- | [[File:Venipede.png|40px]] Venipede |- | [[File:Cottonee.png|40px]] Cottonee || rowspan=2|[[File:Veteran_(male).png|40px]] Veteran Murphy || rowspan=2|[[File:Larvesta.png|40px]] Larvesta, [[File:Pinsir.png|40px]] Pinsir,[[File:Heracross.png|40px]] Heracross, [[File:Leavanny.png|40px]] Leavanny, [[File:Scolipede.png|40px]] Scolipede |- | [[File:Petilil.png|40px]] Petilil |}
